experiment.name: Frequency-Based Streaming Query Comparison
experiment.description: Compare different streaming query approaches across multiple frequencies

avgAcceleration.name: Average Acceleration
avgAcceleration.sparql:
PREFIX saref: <https://saref.etsi.org/core/>
                            PREFIX dahcc: <https://dahcc.idlab.ugent.be/Homelab/SensorsAndActuators/>
                            SELECT (AVG(?value) as ?avgAcceleration)
                            WHERE {
                                ?obs saref:hasValue ?value .
                                ?obs saref:relatesToProperty dahcc:smartphoneX .
                            }
